mapper.select: select o.* from goods_order o left join member m on o.member_id = m.id where (o.display_id = #{str} or m.name = #{str} or m.mobilephone = #{str}) and o.order_state >= 12
mapper.update: update goods_order set order_state = #{status},update_time = now() where id = #{id}
update goods_order set order_information = #{information},update_time = now() where id = #{id}
